name: SAW inc. (#AmazeMeGJ edition)
description:
Made for #AmazeMeGJ.

Platformer game made in bright shimmering colors, feauturing one level but a lot more traps. After a long time searching for work, you finally found one place. And it was... SAW inc., corporation that specialised on T R A P S

You wake up after a long party and find there are no other workers but you.  And you can not remember the way out (the party was really long).

CONTROLS:

A, D - left, right

S - crouch

SPACE - jump

E - interact
